#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- cryaudioimpl.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("CryAudioImpl_uber_0.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Header Files"
		"ATLEntities.h"
		"AudioEvent.h"
		"AudioImpl.h"
		"AudioImplCVars.h"
		"AudioObject.h"
		"AudioTrigger.h"
		"Common.h"
		"resource.h"
		"stdafx.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Source Files"
		"AudioEvent.cpp"
		"AudioImpl.cpp"
		"AudioImplCVars.cpp"
		"AudioObject.cpp"
		"AudioTrigger.cpp"
		"Common.cpp"
		"CryAudioImpl.cpp"
)

add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"stdafx.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

if(EXISTS ${SDK_DIR}/Audio/portaudio AND EXISTS ${SDK_DIR/Audio/libsndfile)
	CryEngineModule(CryAudioImplPortAudio PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio/Implementations")
	target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE -DPORTAUDIO_FOR_$<UPPER_CASE:$<CONFIG>>)
	target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ../../Common ${SDK_DIR}/Audio/portaudio/inc ${SDK_DIR}/Audio/libsndfile/include)
	if (WIN64)
		set(platform win64)
		set(portaudio_suffix x64)
	elseif(WIN32)
		set(platform win32)
		set(portaudio_suffix x86)
	endif()
	if(WIN32)
		set_property(TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY LINK_FLAGS " ${LIBPATH_FLAG}${SDK_DIR}/Audio/libsndfile/lib/${platform}")
		set_property(TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY LINK_FLAGS_DEBUG " ${LIBPATH_FLAG}${SDK_DIR}/Audio/portaudio/lib/${platform}/debug")
		set_property(TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY LINK_FLAGS_PROFILE " ${LIBPATH_FLAG}${SDK_DIR}/Audio/portaudio/lib/${platform}/release")
		set_property(TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY LINK_FLAGS_RELEASE " ${LIBPATH_FLAG}${SDK_DIR}/Audio/portaudio/lib/${platform}/release")
	endif()
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE libsndfile-1 portaudio_${portaudio_suffix})
else()
	CryFileContainer(CryAudioImplPortAudio SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio/Implementations")
endif()
